description: Sean's working out in his garage training for the upcoming triathlon when Nick stops by for a quick beginner course. Nick thinks he has what it takes but Sean is very doubtful and suggests that he needs to come inside for the full training course. Once inside Sean gets Nick on his knees and trains the fuck out of his mouth and ass. Nick is happy to be of service and wastes no time in showing Sean all of his skills and positions that he can be put in. Nick is a flexible little guy and Sean takes advantage of that to the fullest extent. Sean towers over Nick as he pounds deep into his ass which sends Nick over board into an explosive ending.  Enjoy!
title: THE TRIATHLETE
